SELECT E.ID,E.PERSON_CODE,E.PERSON_NAME,IF(E.SEX='MALE','1','0') AS SEX,O.ID AS ORG_ID,O.ORG_CODE,O.ORG_NAME, C.ID AS CU_ID,C.CODE AS CU_CODE,C.NAME AS CU_NAME,C.STATUS FROM NP_SYS_PERSON E INNER JOIN NP_SYS_ORGANIZE O ON E.ORG_ID=O.ID INNER JOIN NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT C ON E.CONTROLUNITID=C.ID WHERE E.IS_CLERK=1 AND E.ID= #{id}
SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,STATUS,TYPE,FULL_PATH,PARENTID,ORDER_NO FROM NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND PARENTID=#{parentId}
SELECT COUNT(ID) AS SIZE FROM NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND PARENTID=#{parentId}
SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,STATUS,TYPE,FULL_PATH,PARENTID,ORDER_NO FROM NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND ID=#{cuId}
SELECT ID,CODE,NAME,STATUS,TYPE,FULL_PATH,PARENTID,ORDER_NO FROM NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT WHERE STATUS='NORMAL' AND PARENTID IS NULL

SELECT EMP.ID,EMP.PERSON_CODE,EMP.PERSON_NAME,IF(EMP.SEX='MALE','1','0') AS SEX,EMP.AGE,EMP.TELEPHONE,EMP.OFFICE_TEL,EMP.CARD_NO, EMP.ADDRESS,EMP.NATIVE_PLACE,ORG.ORG_CODE,ORG.ORG_NAME,CU.CODE AS CU_CODE,CU.NAME AS CU_NAME,EMP.WORK_TYPE AS PERSON_TYPE FROM NP_SYS_PERSON EMP LEFT OUTER JOIN NP_SYS_ORGANIZE ORG ON ORG.ID=EMP.ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT CU ON CU.ID=EMP.CONTROLUNITID WHERE EMP.PERSON_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inputStr},'%' ) OR EMP.PERSON_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inputStr},'%' ) OR EMP.TELEPHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inputStr},'%' ) OR EMP.OFFICE_TEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inputStr},'%' ) OR EMP.CARD_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inputStr},'%' )

select AREA_NAME as name from NP_EQ_AREA AREA
WHERE AREA.AREA_CLASS='BROUGH' and AREA.FULL_PATH like CONCAT((select FULL_PATH from NP_EQ_AREA where AREA_NAME = #{name}),'%' )
where PARENT_ID = (select id from NP_EQ_AREA where AREA_NAME = '京东集团')

SELECT AREA.AREA_NAME as name, AREA.COORD1_X as x, AREA.COORD1_Y as y, LEVEL as level FROM NP_EQ_AREA AREA LEFT JOIN NP_CF_SUBSYSTEM SUB ON AREA.ID = SUB.AREA_ID LEFT JOIN NP_SYS_CONTROLUNIT CU ON CU.ID = SUB.MANAGE_ID WHERE AREA.AREA_CLASS='BROUGH' and AREA.FULL_PATH like CONCAT((select FULL_PATH from NP_EQ_AREA where AREA_NAME = #{name}),'%' )
